p.b: Public Notices of the Gentoo Foundation Inc. 2008

body.p: This page provides links to all of the public notices issued by the Gentoo Foundation During 2008. Notices are in reverse chronological order.
04 September 2008Appointment of Deedra Waters as Trustee
03 September 2008 Appointment of Matthew Summers as Secetary
09 August 2008 Advertisement for Trustee and Secretary following the resignation of Tom Gall
